body_html:
Please use the forum to ask questions.

In your case, I guess the targets comes from numpy? Since Tensors share content with numpy arrays, they cannot be resized, you have to .clone() them before.
body_text:
Please use the forum to ask questions.
In your case, I guess the targets comes from numpy? Since Tensors share content with numpy arrays, they cannot be resized, you have to .clone() them before.
body:
Please use the [forum](https://discuss.pytorch.org/) to ask questions.

In your case, I guess the `targets` comes from numpy? Since `Tensor`s share content with numpy arrays, they cannot be resized, you have to `.clone()` them before.
